full_text: By signing this agreement, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the conditions of this Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them. R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA UNITED STATES ATTORNEY Dated: By: A. MARIE VILLAFANA ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY Dated: 9/24/07 JEFFREY EPSTEIN Dated: GERALD LEFCOURT, ESQ. COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN Dated: LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ. ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN Page 7 of 7 DOJ-OGR-00023347

text_blocks.content: By signing this agreement, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the conditions of this Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.
R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA UNITED STATES ATTORNEY
A. MARIE VILLAFANA ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY
GERALD LEFCOURT, ESQ. COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN
LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ. ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN

additional_notes: The document appears to be a Non-Prosecution Agreement signed by Jeffrey Epstein and various attorneys. The document is dated 9/24/07 and is page 7 of 7.
